storyInfo: The heads of the two famiglie decide to join forces. For the first time during her years in Siracusa, Texas scores a kill that she deems worthwhile. Lavinia is unable to find the answer she seeks.

attributes.content: Quartiere Saluzzo
Leon.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I've never been one to tell you what to do. I've always hoped you'd come to your own decisions about everything.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You've done well, all these years.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: If you really think that, then why...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Why did you suddenly decide to act now?
Why are you telling me this?
Why... did you betray Lavinia?
Countless questions swirl around Leontuzzo's mind, but none of them leave his lips.
What he just saw and heard seems to contradict his cognition. He suddenly feels as if the man before him is not his father. He's like a stranger.
Because this is the best, and only chance.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: What do you mean by that?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You'll find out soon enough.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Signor Bernardo, Signor Leontuzzo, it's a pleasure to see you.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Hmm? You're not one of Saluzzo's associates.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Segretario di Sicurezza Alimentare, Rubio. Why are you...?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: My dipartimento is catering tonight's banquet. I'll be cooking, personally.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I've heard that in Volsinii, no event worth its salt can be held without the endorsement of il Dipartimento di Sicurezza Alimentare.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You speak too highly of me.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I'm just hoping to make food that satisfies the fine men and women of every famiglia.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Yet another reason to look forward to tonight's banquet.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You came.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Where is he right now?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: He went to the Saluzzo mansion.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You're not going to ask why?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I can tell that Bernardo is very important to you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: When I became a judge, he didn't ask me to abuse my position to protect the famiglia backing me, like all the other judges.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: He let me do what I wanted to do.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Leon, too.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: As the Bellone boss in this city, he respects my work and the brand of justice I seek to uphold.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Even if I rule against the Bellones, he sees it as strictly business.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: In his words, my justice is more effective than blind violence.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I don't object to his understanding of justice. He even spends some of his spare time reading law literature.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Even so, as a judge, I still have to come face-to-face with the injustices that constantly plague this city.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The power struggles between the famiglie, their oppression of the common folk, and the silent rage of the masses...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The more I tried to uphold justice, the more difficult I realized my path was.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I used to comfort myself that 'at least I'm not the tool of some famiglia.'
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But how could that be true? My hands are already dirty.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I just didn't want to want to admit it. It's impossible not to get your hands dirty.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Even if this seems silly to you...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The promise Bernardo made to me was the only reason I was able to remain a judge in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Promise?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: He once told me that after Famiglia Bellone emerged victorious, he would carve out a piece of land in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: There, the law I placed my faith in would no longer rely on pure power, where the justice I sought could truly be realized.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: He's hoped I could be patient until that day comes.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Every time I start to think I can't bear it anymore, I think of his promise.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Tell me, if all of this was a lie, then what purpose has my life had for the past ten years?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I think... given his power and status, he wouldn't need to lie to you like that.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Right? That's why—
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Who is it?
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: Huh? You're—
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: I am Judge Lavinia. I would like to speak with Don Alberto regarding the murder of Carracci.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Your Honor... The Don is entertaining an honored guest right now and doesn't have time to...
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: By honored guest, do you mean Bernardo Bellone?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Please inform the two dons that this matter is of great importance.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I will not leave until I see them.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Please try this one. I learned it from a Leithanian chef.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Not bad, not bad.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Times have really changed, Bernardo.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: In the old days, whenever we wanted something, it was all: 'I must have it, and I'll kill anyone who gets in my way.'
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: But now?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I need to find officials or businessmen who are on good terms with me, and ask them to get it for me. Be discreet about it too. Wouldn't want news to get out.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Ridiculous.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Isn't that right, Rubio?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Ah... Anything you desire, can be yours, Don Alberto. For one to be called upon to get what you want is his honor.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Segretario Rubio, you must've been plenty lucky yourself to fill that position.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I didn't have that kind of luck, which is why I had to go about it this way. I'm just a clown, currying favor with the bosses.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Heh. Look at this guy, always talking himself down. The fact that you're even here today is enough to prove your worth.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You're right, Don Alberto.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Alright, Bernardo. We've spent enough time exchanging pleasantries, so let's get down to business.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You want to do what the Dodici Famiglie have always wanted to do, but never had the guts—take her down.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: And sure. You have my support.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: But you've only just muddied the waters. If you really want to overthrow her, you're a long way away.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: The fact that you even dared to come to this dinner shows that the cards are still in your hand.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: So tell me, what exactly do you plan to do?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Alberto, what do you think about Famiglia Rossati?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Rossati?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: They've got ambition.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Famiglia Rossati isn't alive today just because Giovanna's standing up as Salvadore's successor.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Someone must think the legacy of the Texas name—old Salvadore's knack for unification, was an invaluable asset.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: If you ask me, it's a liability.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Charisma this, charisma that. In the end, money is what talks. It's the only thing that'll get anyone to give a damn about you.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You're right. And also wrong.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: From where we stand, there are always methods of convincing people.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: And to be fair, I do somewhat admire Giovanna.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: While the Texas legacy did make for a liability, she took it up willingly, and managed to make it her own..
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: It's true that the Rossatis have depended on the wealth and connections they've accumulated.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But, they've gone too far.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: In what way?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Do you really think she wants to hand over the key to the new city to either of our famiglie?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: We've been jostling for power here, but the Rossatis haven't shown the slightest interest in participating, as if they're not even here in our world.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But, they are the same Rossatis that took up Salvadore's legacy. They handed over the technology to build that city to Siracusa. Do you really think they're bystanders in all this?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: To a new city built to commemorate Salvadore?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: A new city that could change the trajectory of Siracusa?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You mind putting it in plain Siracusan for me?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: How could I possibly be more direct, Alberto?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: The Dodici Famiglie have been battling here in Volsinii. And to her, this is nothing more than a beast-fighting exhibition.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Don Alberto... (*whispers*)
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: Hmm? Judge Lavinia, and Cellinia?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: They want to see me and Bernardo?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: What's the meaning of this, Bernardo?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: They're not with me.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: The Saluzzos have never been anything but hospitable to our guests.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: But, to those who are not guests—
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You can deal with them according to the Saluzzo way.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Haha, alright then. You heard the man?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Yes, Don Alberto.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: Bernardo, I know you enjoy chatting about plans, and the future.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: But I like more practical topics, myself.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Because you know those like the back of your hand.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: The people know the Saluzzos never place a bet lightly. But few remember that when a Saluzzo does place a bet, he doesn't let it go lightly either.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Rubio, the rest is not meant for your ears.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I get it—
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Segretario Rubio, do you have any interest in opera?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Oh... I sometimes go, when I have the time.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Perfect.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Take this.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: This is... a ticket to 'La Morte di Texas' Act II?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Yes. If it sounds like something you'd be interested in, feel free to go check it out.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I told you, Bernardo. The time for pleasantries is over.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I'd also like to invite all Saluzzos and their associates to enjoy the show together.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: It's time to go.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: This is a private party.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: And what if I told you I must see the dons today?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The Saluzzos have a particular way of showing hospitality to unwelcome guests.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Cellinia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: This is what I'm here for, isn't it?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You dare pull your sword on a Saluzzo? Cellinia, last of the Texases, are you outta your mind?
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: Flip that one around.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: To kill, not for the sake of killing, but for an honest and sincere hope—since her return to Siracusa, this is the fight that has felt the least empty to her.
That is what Texas thinks.
My theater manager informed me that Famiglia Rossati has reserved a VIP box for tomorrow night's show.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Haha, staging a hit in a theater? Is that how the esteemed artistic director of Compagnia dell'alba operates?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: It's just sprinkling the dressing of truth onto a play.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But, there is one thing I still have doubts about.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Giovanna has heavies from Columbia among her associates.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Especially her boss in this city, Wallach. I've heard rumors of his methods.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: How are you sure we'll be able to bring her down together?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Don Alberto... (*whispers*)
attributes.name: Radical Mafioso

attributes.content: Haha, sounds like fun.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Bernardo, the judge and that Texas... very much want to see us.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: They've already wounded some of my soldiers.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: They are both close friends of yours, Bellone. Care to explain?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: The associates of Famiglia Saluzzo have always been known for their bloodlust and combativeness.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Alberto, if the Rossatis came to attack your home...
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: What do you think their chances would be?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Zilch. They wouldn't stand a chance.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Cellinia will be the blade that runs through the heart of Famiglia Rossati.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Where Rossati soldiers can't go, Cellinia can.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: So, what are you worried about? Can the Rossatis stop her?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I remember you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I thought you totally gave up on this place, like you never even lived here.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: My time with the Saluzzos wasn't so bad.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Then, you gotta know what it is you're doing.
attributes.name: Loyal Mafioso

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Texas, you...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Looking at the unconscious mafiosi strewn around her, Lavinia can't help but be briefly lost for words.
Even with all this, Texas was still holding back. She thought she had seen it all in her time dealing with the famiglie, but this is still beyond her comprehension.
I'm glad I'm on your side.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Unfortunately, it looks like this is as far as we'll get.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Leon?!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia... you shouldn't have come.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I have to ask Bernardo something, face-to-face.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The assassination of the boss of Famiglia Rossati has already been decided.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Saluzzo and Bellone will join forces.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That's the decision they made?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It was our decision.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Where is he?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Dinner just ended. My father is upstairs.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You can see him, but nothing will change.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Along the way, Lavinia keeps running over a million different things to say.
There are too many questions she wants to ask Bernardo.
She imagines the countless arguments she'd have with him, as well as their outcomes.
She thinks she has mustered enough anger.
However, when she steps through the door, the scene she encounters shakes her to the core.
Bernardo sits upright in a luxurious chair.
In his hand rests a legal codex adorned with thorns.
The very same as the one she holds in her hands.
He lowers his head and rubs the tome lightly with his palms, as if completely unaware—of the thorns digging into his hands, of the bright blood trickling down.
Her chaotic thoughts all freeze in this moment.
In the end, thousands of words condense into one—
Why?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The game is over, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: That sentence alone is already enough for her.
Only a few moments of silence pass, but she is already sapped of all her strength.
Lavinia turns to leave and does not look back, frightened of the tears about to roll from her eyes.
Bernardo remains in place, uttering not a single word as a few drops of his blood dye the floor.
